metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5009 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Snoopy allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-5008.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> marked 'needed' to ensure the incorrect fix isn't applied alone

criterions.comment: libphp-snoopy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
